snippet.title: Dragon Ball Universe MMO - 2d open world sandbox RP & PvP base building game
snippet.description:
Everything is made by the players! Houses, technology, items. Train a warrior of any race in Dragon Ball! In depth stat & ability customization!
Play here!: https://gamejolt.com/games/dragon-universe/393678
https://team7star.itch.io/dragon-universe
https://www.indiedb.com/games/dragon-universe
https://www.moddb.com/games/dragon-universe
https://www.indiexpo.net/en/games/dragon-universe
DISCORD (important): https://discord.gg/7f5F5dC
Online Server Lists:
https://du-webhub.herokuapp.com/

Each server can handle 120 players at once, or more on a better VPS.

HEY ARE YOU FROM BYOND? CONFUSED? Yes this is a BYOND game, but it was kicked off of BYOND so that's why you don't see it there. But now we made a special Launcher that lets people play without BYOND. You can still play Dragon Universe using that on the links above. But if you don't want to use that and you already have BYOND installed, then go to this server list website (https://du-webhub.herokuapp.com/) and you can join a direct server link through BYOND right there. THANKS!
